Key Match Events: Niclas Füllkrug - 27' goal, Jamal Musiala - 58' goal, Florian Wirtz - 66' goal, Aleksandar Pavlovic - 77' goal, Kai Havertz - 81' penalty goal
Post-Match Reflections: Niclas Füllkrug: 'It is fun to watch that today. Jamal was in really good form. It is great to have him in the squad.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany no longer have any 2014 World Cup winners in the squad following the international retirements of Thomas Mueller, Toni Kroos and Manuel Neuer. Former captain Ilkay Gündogan also ended his international career.
Others: Germany play Netherlands on Tuesday and also face Bosnia in their group.
